page.title: Two States Accuse Aventis on Flu Vaccine
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - The governors of Illinois and New Mexico accused French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SASY.PA target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SASY.PA</A> of balking in providing data to U.S. regulators in the states' attempts to secure flu vaccine in the midst of a national shortage.
